title: 3 Signs That You Will Become Rich One Day

json.text: Over the years I've been fortunate enough...
to of spent time with millionaires as well as a billionaire.
and during that period, I've really noticed, what's made them successful in regards to their mindset and habits they've enforced in their life...
so in this video, I'm going to reveal to you the three signs that will really determine whether or not you're on path...
towards success.
so i urge you, if this already sounds like you. The signs I will be revealing today.
I urge you and challenge you to X10 IT!
So you constantly better yourself right?
And if these signs don't sound like you, I challenge you to basically try out and make it part of your identity...
As these traits will make you successful.
There's no doubt about it as it's modelled after billionaires and millionaires I've spent time with...
Ok guys so let us begin!
The first point is all to do with speed of implementation...
So what I've noticed from having spent time with very successful people...
Is the rate they absorb the information and actually go do it!
Speed of implementation. They literally do it like there is no tomorrow!
So to give you an example...
I was on a Skype call with my billionaire mentor.
and I was giving him some advice in regards to digital marketing as that's my area of speciality
And he did not know much about Facebook advertisements...
So, i told him the tweaks he could make, to make his campaigns more successful...
and i got off a call and I noticed a little ting sound you get from Skype
and I checked the message and he was like Tim, I've finished. What shall I do next?
Literally, within 50 seconds he'd already done it!
That was incredible!
But this was just a pattern I noticed amongst very successful people...
It's like they read a book. They get that little snippet of information and they apply it on their life immediately...
It's literally like they pull the trigger... Like there and then. They don't even think about it...
There's NO data for LATER... There's none of this "shelf help"
They literally absorb then implement...
So this is something I ensured I implemented in my life...Because this is one of those traits you really got to enforce on in yourself...
So now days, whenever I learn something I'm like BOOM... I do it!
and in fact I recall when I was trying to get my first mentor, I knew he was challenging me to see how hungry i was...
and he told me about where he lived...
and I knew he was basically hinting I should book tickets.
So as soon as I got off that call.
within that 30 seconds I'd already booked those tickets and I messaged him saying...
ok do you want to meet me at the station and we will go to your house?
and yep you can be assured that he ended up becoming my mentor as a result!
because I demonstrated to him, how hungry I was!
so i urge you to increase your speed of implementation...
the rate you take action. as you will begin to see results faster!
ok guys, let's go on to the next point!
Ok, the second point is the ability to take action when you feel uncertain!
you see a lot of successful people I've spent time with.
right, whenever they don't feel sure about something... before that mind has that time to stop them...
in their tracks, they'd already paid for it and they'd already moved forwards...
one of Tony Robbins quotes summarises this perfectly. He said that success is determined by the amouont of uncertainity you can comfortably handle....
this is what I've noticed with successful people.
they literally can handle that amount of uncertainity.
whenever they don't feel sure, they pull the trigger to find out whether or not it's a good idea.
right, they literally pull the trigger... they never hesistate!
because they realise how imporatant time is.
so they don't waste time, they just do it and figure out whether or not it's a good idea...
if they end up failing, they learn from it. But they don't procrastinate, they just take that action!
Right? even if they feel uncertain, they are like BOOM! they do it.
so that's the second sign, is about the ability to take action when you feel uncertain.
Ok let's go on to the last point guys!
Ok the last point is all to do with, how much you value your time.
If you're somebody who makes every single second count, towards your dream
and you don't waste any single second. As you realise how important time is...
That's a sign you're going to be incredibly successful.
What I've noticed from hanging around with very successful people, is that they value their time...
and their really strict about it...
they schedule that shit in!
and never waste time, they don't lounge about, they don't spend time on social media, they don't spend time...
watching Netflix or all this bullshit news on the TV. Their out there making their dream happen!
Right? and they also have a crazy morning and evening schedule, they go to sleep early usually...
They wake up early around 4am and their out there doing it. 18 hour days, literally griding, hustling, making it happen!
This is total opposite of average people if you think about it, average people complain of their 8 or 9 hour shifts at work!
Where as successful people, because their doing what they love, they can't get enough of it...
That's why their happy to do their 18 hour days and so forth!
So this is something I made sure I enforced, as a lot of you guys know I've got a crazy morning ritual that  usually starts at around 5 or 6am...
so guys they are the 3 signs:
The first sign is speed of implementation, the rate you can take action!
The second sign is your ability to take action when you don't feel sure...
The third sign is all to do with how you treat your time...
Are you somebody who wastes time on social media? or are you somebody who goes out and makes it happen?
ok guys, that's it for this video! thank you so much for watching, if you're new to this make sure to SUBSCRIBE!
As always, follow your heart and take action! and let's go live we're born to live... let's go!
